name: Rescue Squad (Triangular Pixels)
description:
Pilot a rescue helicopter and use your rope and winch to save the stranded people and deliver them to safety in the nearby towers. Towers also need food and medical supplies which you must bring them. And all against the clock!

Rescue Squad was written by John in 2007, as an entry for the GameDev.net Mystery Aspect one week game programming competition. All code and art was made in just a single week, and the theme for the competition was “towers”.

Use the arrow keys to move, and the space bar to change height and land. More details can be found in the “instructions” menu in the game.
